statements: SELECT * FROM MedicationTracking WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM MedicationTracking WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM MedicationTracking WHERE administration_time >= '2022-09-15';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM MedicationTracking WHERE compliance = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MedicationTracking;
SELECT * FROM MedicationTracking WHERE patient_id = 123456;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM MedicationTracking WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM MedicationTracking WHERE compliance = TRUE ORDER BY administration_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, compliance FROM MedicationTracking WHERE compliance = FALSE AND dosage < 100 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM MedicationTracking GROUP BY compliance;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT id, name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE last_taken > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medication_logs ORDER BY compliance DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT medication_id, dose_taken, compliance FROM medication_logs WHERE compliance = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'Twice daily' ORDER BY last_taken DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM medication_logs WHERE compliance = true;
SELECT m.name, ml.dose_taken, ml.timestamp FROM medications m JOIN medication_logs ml ON m.id = ml.medication_id WHERE m.name = 'Ibuprofen';
SELECT m.name, COUNT(ml.log_id) AS dose_count FROM medications m LEFT JOIN medication_logs ml ON m.id = ml.medication_id GROUP BY m.name ORDER BY dose_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM MedicationRecords
SELECT record_id, dosage_taken, timestamp FROM MedicationRecords
SELECT * FROM Medications
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT medication_name, dosage, patient_name FROM Medications INNER JOIN MedicationRecords ON Medications.medication_id = MedicationRecords.medication_id
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage_taken FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicationRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicationRecords.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT date_time, quantity FROM Medication_Log ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT patient_name, compliance_status FROM Patients JOIN Compliance_Log ON Patients.patient_id = Compliance_Log.patient_id WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM Medications INNER JOIN Medication_Log ON Medications.drug_id = Medication_Log.drug_id WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT patient_name, compliance_status FROM Patients INNER JOIN Compliance_Log ON Patients.patient_id = Compliance_Log.patient_id WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT id, name FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceRecords;
SELECT medication_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM MedicationLogs GROUP BY medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT p.name, m.name, m.dosage FROM Medications m JOIN Patients p ON m.id = p.id;
SELECT pr.name, pr.specialization, pr.contact, COUNT(pl.patient_id) AS patient_count FROM Physicians pr LEFT JOIN MedicationLogs pl ON pr.id = pl.patient_id GROUP BY pr.id;
SELECT p.name, m.name, c.compliance_status FROM Patients p JOIN MedicationLogs l ON p.id = l.patient_id JOIN ComplianceRecords c ON l.id = c.log_id WHERE p.gender = 'Female';
